effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} by three [stages]{mechanic:stage}.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} by three [stages]{mechanic:stage} in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
命中を　かなり　あげる。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

It drastically raises the accuracy of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta moltissimo la precisione di un Pokémon
in una lotta. L’effetto svanisce se il Pokémon
è sostituito.

Hebt die Genauigkeit eines Pokémon im Kampf
stark an. Die Wirkung endet mit dem Austausch
des Pokémon.

Augmente sensiblement la Précision pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe si le Pokémon
se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 명중률을
상당히 올린다. 포켓몬을 볼에
넣어버리면 원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
めいちゅうを　かなり　あげる。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

It drastically raises the accuracy of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

It drastically raises the accuracy of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte sensiblement la Précision
pendant un combat. L’effet s’estompe
si le Pokémon se retire.
